content.rendered:
Qatar 2024 Pakistan International School Advertisement. Pakistan International School Doha Qatar 2024 is hiring male and female teachers. Pakistan International School Doha Qatar Jobs 2024 invites applications from qualified and experienced candidates. A newspaper advertisement and a website for NTS announced the Pakistan International School Doha Qatar Jobs 2024 (PISQ Jobs 2024). The posting will be in Doha, Qatar, and is open to both men and women.

School Doha Qatar has announced jobs for teachers (male/female) for 2024. The Pakistan International School in Doha Qatar offers excellent career opportunities. As a bridge between cultures, PISQ nurtures young minds from diverse backgrounds and weaves a tapestry of academic excellence and cultural diversity.

Details:

On its official website, National Testing Services (NTS) published the advertisement for Pakistan International School Doha Qatar Jobs 2024. Applications are invited from all eligible Pakistani candidates. The deadline for applications is Oct 29, 2024.

The following vacancies are available:

Pakistan International School Doha Qatar (PISQ) is hiring for the following positions:

  1. In the conventional system, grades V to XII (males and females)

  2. IGCSE Stream (Male / Female)

Primary Wing (Female): Grades 1 to 5

Teachers for the Conventional System for Grades XII (Male / Female) for Chemistry, Mathematics, English, Urdu, and Arabic:

The minimum requirement is a master’s degree in relevant subjects. A B.Ed, M.Ed, or M.Phil degree is preferred, along with a minimum of five years of experience at the relevant grade level in a reputable institution. (Private degrees will not be accepted). QR 4,500 is the salary package.

Teachers for Primary Wing Grades 1 to 5 (Female):

Bachelor’s degree with a B.Ed or M.Ed. Five years of teaching experience in a reputed institution is preferred. Private degrees are not acceptable. The salary package is QR 3,750.

How to Apply Online

On the official website of National Testing Services (NTS), candidates from all over Pakistan can apply online. Please provide all the required information, including your personal and educational details. The deadline for applications is Oct 29, 2024.

Latest Job In August 2024

  • Qatar Jobs 2024 New Brand Manpower Management
  • Latest Private Company Peshawar Classified Jobs August 2024
  • Job At Balochistan Wheels Limited In Karachi In August 2024
  • Job at Quaid e Azam Divisional Public School and College in 2024
